hero.description: MAWA is a memecoin on Solana with a crocodile mascot, premium branding and a long-term vision.

items.a: MAWA stands out with premium branding, long-term vision, locked liquidity (12 months) and transparent tokenomics.
Crocodiles symbolize resilience, patience and strength.
Official launch planned for 13 September 2025. Follow socials for exact timing.
